special_text:
[i](At the beginning of your upkeep, if you weren’t dealt combat damage since your last turn, put a brick counter on this Outpost.)[/i]
When this Outpost enters, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. [i](It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
 2+ Bricks
Zombies you control have menace.
 3+ Bricks
Zombies you control have deathtouch.
